title: Happier with Gretchen Rubin: My Precious!
description:
Ep. 17: Why it's a good idea to have an exact place for everything; beware of anything we call "our preciousss," the challenge of staying in touch, and how to re-frame the experience of plane
rides.  Want to get in touch? @gretchenrubin; @elizabethcraft; podcast@gretchenrubin.com; happiercast.com/17; 774-277-9336.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
